mapper.insert: INSERT klass (course_id, grade, klass_serial, klass_time, klass_location) VALUE (#{courseId}, #{grade}, #{klassSerial}, #{klassTime}, #{klassPlace})
mapper.select: select klass.id as klassId, grade, klass_serial as klassSerial, klass_time as klassTime, klass_location as klassLocation, course.id as courseId, course_name as courseName from klass, course where klass.id = #{klassId} and course.id = klass.course_id

select klass.id as klassId, grade, klass_serial as klassSerial, klass_time as klassTime, klass_location as klassLocation, course.id as courseId, course_name as courseName from klass, course where klass.course_id = #{courseId} and course.id = klass.course_id
select klass_id as klassId, enroll_number as enrollNumber from klass_round where round_id = #{roundId}
